doc:
Kevin Miles https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_Miles 0 Kevin Miles is an Australian actor best known for his role as Godfrey Carson in the Australian television legal drama Carson's Law. Miles also appeared in Delta (1969), Dynasty (1970) and The Power, The Passion (1989). Kevin Miles was born in Melbourne Australia in 1929. Kevin_Miles is an_Australian_actor best_known for his_role as Godfrey_Carson in the_Australian_television_legal_drama_Carson 's_Law . Miles also appeared in Delta_(_1969_) , Dynasty_(_1970_) and The_Power , The_Passion_(_1989_) . Kevin_Miles was_born in Melbourne_Australia in 1929 .
